meanings.sent1: She is the gossipier one in our group, always sharing stories about others.
meanings.sent2: The gossipier girl in school knows everything about everyone.
meanings.sent3: The gossipier parrot in the pet shop repeated all the secrets it overheard.
meanings.sent4: Her gossipier nature was like a magnet, attracting all the latest news to her.
meanings.sent5: His gossipier behavior made him the center of attention wherever he went.

meanings.definition: More inclined to gossip than someone or something else
meanings.sent1: She is even gossipier than her sister, always eager to share rumors.
meanings.sent2: The gossipier of the two friends couldn't keep a secret for long.
meanings.sent3: The gossipier cat in the neighborhood knew all the juicy details about everyone's business.
meanings.sent4: Her gossipier tendencies shone through when she started spreading the latest scandal.
meanings.sent5: His gossipier attitude made him the go-to person for any news or updates.
